name: WordSortgame
0:
”Alexa, start Word Sort game”
”Alexa, open Word Sort game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word sort game
des:
The process of sorting words into various categories is the heart of word study. By categorizing different words by certain elements, young children make sense of words and patterns within words. 
Skill gives you different categories with some instruction. You have to arrange the words in the correct sequence. To invoke the skill say Alexa open Word Sort Game.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
